attributes.action: DO MORE TO CUT CONGESSION LIKE PUTTING UP SIGNS AT RAIL CROSSINGS TO REMIND DRIVERS TO SWITCH OFF ENGINE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I WOULD LIKE TO SEE SIGNS AT RAIL CROSSINGS TO REMIND DRIVERS TO CUT ENGINE SO MANY DRIVERS DONT AND IT WOULD GO SOME WAY IN CUTTING POLUTION

rejection.details: Please rewrite in upper and lower case.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
